DOC.brief_summary: To investigate whether a long-term strategy to lower LDL cholesterol with atorvastatin as much as possible will improve prognosis in CHD patients compared with a strategy reflecting current best clinical practice with simvastatin.
DOC.brief_title: Atorvastatin Versus Simvastatin In The Prevention Of Coronary Heart Disease (CHD) In Patients With Known CHD
DOC.criteria: Previous myocardial infarction Women who are breast feeding or are pregnant
